actions.committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare.

official_title: A bill to provide that local educational agencies shall not receive Federal financial assistance to all handicapped children at levels of expenditure at least equal to expenditures for other children.

summary.text: Provides, under the Education of the Handicapped Act, that local educational agencies shall not receive Federal financial assistance under authority of the Commissioner of Education unless they provide educational services to all handicapped children at levels of expenditure at least equal to expenditures for other children.

titles.title: A bill to provide that local educational agencies shall not receive Federal financial assistance to all handicapped children at levels of expenditure at least equal to expenditures for other children.
